resources.string: Once you have objects on your prototype, perform a single tap on one of them to focus it. This will display the overlay shown left.\nYou are now in editmode and able to adjust various parameters of the selected object.\nTo deselect the object, simply tap somewhere else on the screen.
While you are in editmode, you can drag objects around by dragging the center part of the overlay.
While in editmode you can change the size of an object by dragging one of the handles surrounding the selected object.

To delete unwanted objects simply drag the object out of the screen to the deletezone on the left.\nDropping it over the deletezone will delete the object, dragging it back to the screen will reposition it.\nTo cancel the operation drop the object on the black area around the virtual screen.
To create objects, tap on one of the objecttypes shown left. The selected objecttype is highlighted.\nTap on the virtual screen to create a new object at that point.
Tap on the object you want to tune and then select one of the manipulation options shown left.\nTapping on one of the options will expand the box to show the possibilities.
